channel.title: If name contains mod & playerRights <= 2 ---- Not gud wit java, but need help

item.title: If name contains mod & playerRights <= 2 ---- Not gud wit java, but need help
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

But you don’t know what you are doing…

Yesterday you said, You didn’t care about English when I said you could not speak it. Then you said you wanted to make a server, but didn’t want to learn Java. All you had in mind was to get a server source and change the name and some locations and call it yours then host it. I then said, no… just don’t start with a server and expect yourself to gain knowledge. Still you were stubborn and said you didn’t want to learn Java, just to make something cool. That is not how it works, you will never make anything cool. Most servers out there are done horribly, and won’t teach you properly. Go do some basic things first, then when you know some stuff come back and begin to create a server. If you don’t want to learn Java; don’t program in it, and get the fuck off.

Read full topic

item.title: If name contains mod & playerRights <= 2 ---- Not gud wit java, but need help
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

lol, know wut i just fixed it:

I just wrapped it with a if statement:

public void badNames() {
if(playerRights <= 2) { // Fix for Moderator's & player's who make such bad name ~ Server-Unknown.Net
    if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") 
        || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") 
        || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("Your name here") || playerName.contains("mod") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") 
        || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("mod") || playerName.contains("SYI")
        || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) {
        if(kickTimer == 0) {
            sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back.");
            if(checkbannedusers() != 5) {
                disconnected = true; 
                appendToBanned(playerName);
                checkbannedusers();
            }
            kickTimer = 20;
        }
    }
}	
}

And yeah i know its sloppy, its suppose to be a cleaned source. So I got nothing to complain about tbh, just as long as I know wut im doing :).

Read full topic

@_Rich wrote:

That code is terrible, but anyway, here’s an example;

if (p.playerName.contains("mod") && p.playerRights < 1) { p.disconnectPlayer = true; }

item.title: If name contains mod & playerRights <= 2 ---- Not gud wit java, but need help
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

Ok I’m trying to make it on my client where if the player name contains “mod” and there player right is below the admin/staff they get kicked, banned or w/e. I’m trying to make it so, how do I do this?

Here is my code:

... playerName.contains("mod") && playerRights < 2

OK I got other code wrapped around it but if you must have that then:

if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("Your name here") || playerName.contains("mod") && playerRights < 2 || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("mod") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } }

Also wut are the player rights? I forgot wut they were, I think 1 = player, 2 = mod, 3 admin - I’m not sure if it starts from 0 >.<

Read full topic
